attributes.comment:
I support the price increase. Everything else is increasing because of the cost
of illegal immigrants so why shouldn't they bear some of the burden? If they
don't like or can't afford what it costs, then DON"T COME!!! I already live in
an area where there are more illegals then legal immigrants residing and it
makes me upset that they get to follow ONLY those laws that benefit them and not
the rest. We need to close the border and return those who do not belong here.
Maybe Washington doesn't think so but they don't live where I do. Put up the
fence that was already voter approved. If Mr. Bush doesn't think that a fence
deters entry then I guess we can take down the one around the White House!!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Susan Avril
